High blood cholesterol
                
A family history of early heart disease
                
A higher than normal level of protein in their urine
                
Blood Sugar Control
                
Controlling blood sugar levels is good for heart health. For example, controlling blood sugar improves everyday heart function for people who have diabetes and heart failure.",NHLBI,Diabetic Heart Disease
How to prevent Diabetic Heart Disease ?,"Taking action to control risk factors
